title: What about a champ that steals mana / rage / energy?
body:
I think this could be an interesting idea. Maybe they steal a percentage of their opponent's current mana, and deal some amount of damage based on that. The counterplay would be in managing your mana to keep it in a range where the amount stolen wouldn't be as impactful.

It's definitely more interesting than 5 dashes and a 100-0 combo with starting items at lv 3...
